Title: [N-02] Custom Error Params
Content: Consider emitting the current owner in [`AddressRegistry.NFTNotOwnedByUser`](https://github.com/code-423n4/2023-01-canto-identity/blob/dff8e74c54471f5f3b84c217848234d474477d82/src/AddressRegistry.sol#L46). `msg.sender` is included but that may already be clear from context. Including the owner could be a useful addition, e.g. allowing a user to quickly realize that the NFT is in another wallet of theirs.
